chapter.title: Why Use LiveJournal?
chapter.para: LiveJournal is an open source software project, with many uses only limited by the imagination. Use LiveJournal to start your own weblogging community, or just about any site with a community focus. You can use the features such as the support system and feedback technology, that comes bundled with LiveJournal, to run your own online business site.

LiveJournal has many intra-office uses as well, with its easy update and polling features. Use LiveJournal as the meeting board for your LAN, complete with project communities, topic directories, and office wide contact book.
